name: The Lost Tale (GCC Twist Jam)
description:
"The expedition inside an unknown pyramid has begun.

Will you be able to get out alive?" 

Solve puzzles, find and turn the right levers to twist objects, lights, shadows and the surrounding environment.

The mystery behind this pyramid can only be solved by you. Good luck.

{This game was developed for the GCC Jam - Twist - requires CORE to play}

{Singleplayer}

{First Person}

{Puzzle solving}

{Made by NamaBillu}

{Link: https://www.coregames.com/games/722e05/gcc-project}
